column4: Hi - I'm using 9.10x64 with two monitors, one is rotated CCW, with a 260 GT gfx card. I can't get compiz to enable (desktop effects) and I can't figure out why. Any help?
Pastebin the output of compiz from your terminal
You need to learn how to pastebin
No it is not short output and yes there is a need
if it was 300 lines then sure but you're just being petty. I try and get help and you kick me from where I'm getting it?
You will learn to use a pastebin service
i know how to use a pastebin, just the channels I frequent are less strict about "X lines is too many". Seriously, arbitrary rules don't help anyone esp when no-one else was talking when i pasted
I specifically said pastebin and you ignored that not once but twice
Then you childishly call names. You deserve a ban

paste/pastebin, easy to confuse. Didn't ignore it twice so much as read once on two channels. You kicked me from where there was someone helping me instaed of this channel? that's just a powertrip on your part
I'm getting 50% of my lines just about XYZ entered/left the room. This room is flooding faster than the titanic anyway
Anyway, like adamk told you, using xinerama disables composite extension. use twinview instead
whats your problem? you speak to people like youve got a stick stuck somewhere... no reason to be so rude all the time
I thought they showed you how to use /ignore already
but then I wouldn't have you as a perfect example of everything that is wrong with opensource and internet tough guys
